scripts.//: NOTE: cloc is GPL-2.0 and must be installed locally
scripts.count-loc: npm run count-loc:client && npm run count-loc:server
scripts.license-checker: npm run license-checker:client && npm run license-checker:server
scripts.license-checker:client: cd client && cross-conf-env npm run license-checker -- --onlyAllow=npm_package_config_allowedLicenses --excludePackages=npm_package_config_packageLicenseWhitelist
scripts.license-checker:server: cd server && cross-conf-env npm run license-checker -- --onlyAllow=npm_package_config_allowedLicenses --excludePackages=npm_package_config_packageLicenseWhitelist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint-staged: npm run lint-staged:client && npm run lint-staged:server
scripts.test: npm run seed && server-test start "http-get://localhost:3000|http-get://localhost:3001" test:client
scripts.test-gui: npm run seed && server-test start "http-get://localhost:3000|http-get://localhost:3001" test-gui:client
